name: ava-launch
description: instant debug/run of specific AVA tests supporting multiple npm scripts

ava-launch.tempTestFileExtension.markdownDescription: Default extension for temp tests.  Ideal for gathering data for a permanent test or one-time exploration.

ava-launch.tempTestFileScript.markdownDescription: npm script for running temp tests.  You can just use test, but a designated temp test will let you control timeout and other things.

ava-launch.integrationTestFileExtension.markdownDescription: Default extension for integration tests.  You probably will need to increase the timeout.

ava-launch.integrationTestFileScript.markdownDescription: npm script for running your integration tests. Mostly necessary for an increased timeout, but you may want to control the rest of your configuration.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
